author: Siôn Geschwindt
title: Exclusive: Finnish startup raises €25M to put a ‘Donut’ motor in EV wheels
description: Finnish startup Donut Lab has secured €25mn in seed funding to scale up its in-wheel hub motors for electric land, sea, and air vehicles.  Alongside the investment, Donut Lab is opening an R&D hub in Chippenham, UK. Risto Siilasmaa, serial tech investor and f…
content:
Finnish startup Donut Lab has secured 25mn in seed funding to scale up its in-wheel hub motors for electric land, sea, and air vehicles.
